title: So mages, bruisers, tanks, and assassins are getting hit to make ranged ADs better
body:
Reworking trinity and cleaver to favor ADCs
Nerfs to TP
Nerfs to nearly every single AP item 
Making Last Whisper have a higher value but with bonus armor, which fucks over anybody who relied on a huge resist steroid to be viable (Jax, Singed, etc)
Buffing the living shit out of lifesteal and phantom dancer
Making it so ranged ADs have amazing early games due to massive level 1 AD buffs across the board
An item that applies grevious wounds on EVERY AUTO 
Banshee's with 500 HP and 70 Magic Resist + damage reduc on PD = GL assassinating or outdamaging ADC lifesteal while they drain tank a full tank in melee range
Instead of fixing the RNG mess that is crit you put it on EVERY damn item

Gonna be a fun season

But hey at least Rageblade is strong af so there's that

replies.body: Vayne top, Kog'Maw jungle, Mid Varus, and pick whatever ADC you want at bot lane... gonna be fun season
If you've seen the PBE most matches are just 5 ADCs vs 5 ADCs.

Matches on PBE are 5 ADC vs 5 ADC because it's PBE - everybody wants to try out and test new things, the most drastic changes are made to marksmen, so everybody plays them. When Juggernauts were on PBE, everybody was playing Mord, Darius, Garen and Skarner, it's not something unusual.
Enemy picks rengo and zed aaaaand adc its gone

> [{quoted}](name=deJasper36,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ctAO2MP2,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-30T19:08:19.460+0000)
>
> Enemy picks rengo and zed aaaaand adc its gone

Phantom Dancer and Death's Dance mean you can't actually be anywhere near as confident of that anymore.

"It's OK because assassins" makes sense until you see that some of the buffs are specifically based around making ADCs far less easy to blow up.
You forget that Rengar can make people disappear faster than their auto attack animations.
Rengar has to get fed for that to happen.  He's not getting fed off the new ADC overlords.

Rengar builds the stuff ADC's build.

Rengar kills ADC's.

Rengar is the new overlord of assassin's for season 6.

He has to get kills first.  He can't just build whatever the hell he wants with no farm.  In the jungle, the ADC he wants to kill will be FAR ahead of him, and if he is top, just send another ADC up there if you want, and he gets bullied out of lane.
Meh not really. I have seen Rengars that were like 1/10 that just made it to the point they got an item and could do it.
Have you even looked at the new stuff coming in the preseason?

People also forget that across the board AD items give substantially less AD (the strongest give a max of 65 instead of 80) and every ADC in the game has had a major nerf to their AD (albeit in tandem with a buff to early game, their late game base damage is consistently being nerfed). Basically... ADCs look like they might actually be forced into actually DPSing instead of dealing "sustained burst" like they have done for the past several seasons.
Vayne top should be bannable. Someone who hates happiness so much is probably gonna be toxic anyway.
No, Lucian jungle.
Or maybe Graves... AOE basics...
Yep, I tried, it actually worked pretty well, the knock back +dash reduces damage taken, and your W offer some cc for ganking. Your burst when ganking is not a joke.
ya.... graves might actually become a viable farm jungler.... idk about ganks... but his spit pushing is sick
{{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:107}}  >:) okay

Nerf Ap items but buff Mana reg...

{{item:3070}} {{champion:68}} {{item:3070}}
Passive gold generation is up on the Rift now, which is a lot of why AP items have had their prices increased.
witht he gold generation you can buy ad items, too
AD Items that didn't get their cost increased, OFC.

New meta

ADC Top
ADC JG (twitch, kindred primarily)
ADC Mid (varus, ms fortune primarily)
ADC Bot
Support

> [{quoted}](name=Malix Farwin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ctAO2MP2,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-10-30T20:21:54.371+0000)
>
> New meta
> 
> ADC Top
> ADC JG (twitch, kindred primarily)
> ADC Mid (varus, ms fortune primarily)
> ADC Bot
> Support(Ashe primarily)


Just thought it was missing something.
Graves can jungle now too apparently.
They nerfed the items but added deathfire as a keystone. Play diana akali leblanc and get a free 100% AP on your combos thanks to that broken keystone, should make up for the AP item nerfs.

it adds 0.2 Scaling on single target abilities.

0.1 on all other abilities (which is most of them)

~~So it adds 0.6 scaling to Diana's burst combo. 0.7 if you get 3 autos off.~~ 
This is wrong it can't stack. So it just adds .1 scaling on to Diana's burst combo.
{{champion:69}}
How can you not mention {{champion:63}} who gets around 25-30% extra AP scaling on his passive.

> [{quoted}](name=Inept Maverick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ctAO2MP2,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-10-30T18:34:40.374+0000)
>
> How can you not mention {{champion:63}} who gets around 25-30% extra AP scaling on his passive.

Because it's basically Riot saying "you get a brand passive and you get a brand passive...everyone gets a brand passive!"
I just realized these new masteries are basically letting you choose a second passive

Think of it this way: 

If they buff ADCs, and buff all the damage items, people will avoid building defensive

If people avoid building defensive, you do tons of damage to them

If you do tons of damage to them, they die fast.

Except they have range

Guess who dies first if everyone dies really fast, the person who has to get in range or the person who already is at range?
They might as well just add an option "Turn on automatic stutter stepping" in the options menu.

You think mages, bruisers and assassins had it bad.

Then you realize that tanks were made increasingly obsolete ever since Cinderhulk was nerfed. Seriously, give me a way to not get blown up by that {{champion:18}} like I didn't build 400 armor, 3000 bonus HP, and attack speed slows to counter her.

Just build some more... nevermind, all armor got (even further) nerfed.

600 armor Malphite top, 450 armor Rammus jung, 450 armor (insert tanky support) support ftw. Oops, forgot that the prices have gone up even further.
until you realize you don't even have enough money for warden's mail since all the prices went up with no buffs.

Or the fact that EVERY SINGLE AD CHAMPION RELEASE AND REWORK recently has some way to say "You're tanky? Hah, nope."

For example, {{champion:114}} with her scaling %HP true damage. Gets up to ridiculous numbers like 60% later on. I mean, I might as well build f*cking AP {{champion:98}} if you're just going to kill me that fast.
With my luck I'll taunt Fiora and she'll strike a vital o.o. Seriously I hate not being able to be a tank.
Amen, brother. Amen.

Lets not forget that they now have a VERY good grievous wound item that not only provides substantial power with the armor pen but completely fucks champs like {{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:106}}. This inst even a full list of people this item guts and then you have to add any champ who build life steel, like, idk, OTHER ADCs. If you are going against ANYONE who relies on regen, teammate healing, life steel, or spell vamp you'd be dumb to not build Mortal Reminder.

Executioner's Calling.. you mean, the item people have been asking to have re-implemented specifically to let AD champions counter them? Riot putting a GW AD item back in the game didn't come out of nowhere nor was it unasked. Currently, an AD champion has little way to kill a Mundo or Volibear beyond the chance that they have Ignite, and a teamfight against Swain when you have no GW to hit him with is completely and utterly painful, as is Soraka. 

And GW doesn't fuck Garen, because to apply it you have to hit him, which turns off his passive regardless. It also doesn't really screw Morgana because much of her damage is done in a way you can't really retaliate against, and the only ability she may gain substantial health return from is her Q because it's single-target. 

This is looking like doomsaying without merit. People have asked for this and Riot listened.

I wanted the old executioner's calling back. Not this new one + broken items making tanks not being possible anymore. Not to mention with the items that have the giant slayer passive. Sion now gets punished for doing well, yay :P

I don't have a problem with GW itself. I have an issue with 1 items double hitting defense. You shouldn't have both armor pen and GW on one item. These champs lose 2 important stats in one item slot. I would be MUCH happier with GW going onto maybe an AS item. It should be a choice on how you want to deal with these guys not just one overbearing item.

At no point does the want of AD Grievous Wounds necessitate the ease that these versions of Executioner's Calling and Mortal Reminder give. The old version was purposefully left weak because of it's 100% up time on the effect; they've doubled down on the strengths of the item with AoE potential, made it extremely easy to buy into reflexively when a regen champ becomes a problem, and still made its end build power plenty strong.

You aren't kidding about ADs "countering" champions like Mundo with this item. Building into it shuts down heavy regen based champs more than any other effect this game has given. Plenty of people said that Executioner's Calling should come back, but with the stipulation that it lost the constant application of Grievous Wounds to make it a reasonable answer and not a debilitation of regen reliance. This isn't solving problems, this is invalidating a whole side of the match up.
Did I say it should stay in its current form? No, nowhere did I say that. Riot answered the request for an AD item that counters sustain from those types of champions - that's all I said.

Your initial reply was to someone arguing the strength of the item, not the existence of Grievous Wounds. If you're going to concede that this iteration is ridiculous, you shouldn't be appalled at the "doomsaying." I'm confident that it won't stay in this form forever, but this is something too outlandish even for PBE release. It shouldn't take testing to show how polarizing it is.

What! I read the notes on surrender@20 and I thought ranged AD were getting nerfed so hard. All the AD items were either increased cost or lowered AD. 
PD got nerfed not buffed. They lowered its stats. Also lifesteal got buffed by like a few %. Not game breaking especially with the AD nerfs. And all the AS nerfs on PD and Rauuins.

Did you not see that they increased crit substantially on most adc items? Crit is a very important stat for them now. PD didnt get nerfed it got a major buff with that dmg reduction plus ms it gives lol adc got a MAJOR buff over all

Okay, looking back I can see that crit was added to a lot of items. Also when looking at PD I only saw that the AS was lowered and the passive for Movespeed and unit collision was only while near enemy champs. I also saw that all the actual AD items got nerfed because BFS got reduced AD.
